Gbf.name: GetBaseForm
Gbf.summary: Returns the actual [[Base Form]] of a [[leveled]] [[calling reference]].

GLT.name: GetLoadedType
GLT.summary:
Empties a form list and then fills it with every form of the given [[Form_Type_IDs|Form Type ID]] from all loaded plugins.

'''Optional Index parameter''': Passing a value for the 'index' parameter loads only forms from the plugin at that [[GetModIndex|mod index]] (default: -1 for all plugins). 

'''Optional NoClear parameter''': Passing a 1 for the 'noclear' parameter prevents the function from emptying the list before adding forms to it.

GLTA.name: GetLoadedTypeArray
GLTA.summary:
Similar to [[GetLoadedType]], but returns an [[Array_Variables|array]] (rather than a [[FormList]]) filled with every form of the given [[Form_Type_IDs|Form Type ID]] from all loaded plugins.

'''Optional Index parameter''': Passing a value for the 'index' parameter loads only forms from the plugin at that [[GetModIndex|mod index]] (default: -1 for all plugins).
